item.title: Spicy cucumber salad
item.description: Ingredients 1 english cucumber or 3 garden cucumbers 1 tsp of gochugaru 2 garlic cloves 1.5 tbsp of apple cider vinegar 1.5 tbsp of toasted sesame oil 1 tbsp of maple syrup sesame seeds Steps Chop the 2 garlic cloves finely Cut 1 english cucumber or 3 garden cucumbers in medium thick slices In a small bowl combine 1 tsp of gochugaru, the 2 chopped garlic cloves, 1.5 tbsp of apple cider vinegar, 1.
